$interpreted: Morris: Hey Charle, if the Runic Guardian can successfully move, do you want to go on a trip to the East Alliance?
Morris: I heard that there's this unique medical technique there called Qi...
Charle: A long journey? I feel exhausted just hearing about it.
Morris: Ooh, I forgot. You're a couch potato who complains that a trip to Paradise Prairie is "too far". Forget it, I'll go by myself then.
Charle: I'm not done talking yet, hotshot. If you're going as well, then I'll treat it as a extended picnic trip and tag along. You good with that, partner?
Morris: Oh, spare me that partner stuff. I'll allow you to call me that once this experiment is over!
Charle: Ho? Then let's get started right away!
Morris: Charle, you ready?
Charle: Yes. The Soul Energy infuse must be on-point with the very first attempt.
Morris: Let's begin.
Morris: Whew~ I think we can call phase one a success, right?
Charle: Don't let your guard down.
Morris: Hmph, you worry too much...
Charle: Wait, something's not right?
Morris: Idiot! Quick...
Morris: ...run...
Female Academy Pupil: There's a fire in professor Dietrich's lab! Everyone, come and help fight the fire!
Charle: What exactly happened...
Charle: Clovis?
Charle: W-Where's Morris? What about the lab!?
Charle: ...*cough*...what are you doing!?
Aosta: You worthless hack! Why...why are you the one that survived!?
Charle: D-Don't tell me...?
Aosta: Shut up! I'm going to kill you!

Charle: I'm sorry. I know you must be feeling devasted.
However, you're not the only one who finds it difficult to accept this reality.
Aosta: Shut up! You have no right to lecture me!
Aosta: If you're injured, then you should screw off to the medical room now! You do not deserve to enter professor's lab again!
: 11 years later
Charle: This is everything.
Aosta: Thank you.
Charle: Clovis, have you really not considered staying here and continuing Morris' research? You could take Life Magic to new heights...
Aosta: I have my own plans.
Charle: You mean that mysterious plan of yours which you refuse to let anyone know about? After Morris' passing, you've been totally engrossed in it...
Aosta: What are you trying to say?
Charle: The disaster 11 years ago, you were the first one to arrive at the lab. Did you discover something, or...
Aosta: I have no intention to talk about this. Besides, you were there on-site. You should know it better than I do, shouldn't you?
Aosta: After all, that never-aging body of yours...is a direct result of that incident...
Charle: ......
Aosta: All in all, I don't need you to interfere with my business. If that's all you want to say, I'll be taking my leave.
Charle: Understood. Via Soul.

Model.Text: Hey Charle, if the Runic Guardian can successfully move, do you want to go on a trip to the East Alliance?
I heard that there's this unique medical technique there called Qi...
A long journey? I feel exhausted just hearing about it.
Ooh, I forgot. You're a couch potato who complains that a trip to Paradise Prairie is "too far". Forget it, I'll go by myself then.
I'm not done talking yet, hotshot. If you're going as well, then I'll treat it as a extended picnic trip and tag along. You good with that, partner?
Oh, spare me that partner stuff. I'll allow you to call me that once this experiment is over!
Ho? Then let's get started right away!
Charle, you ready?
Yes. The Soul Energy infuse must be on-point with the very first attempt.
Let's begin.
Whew~ I think we can call phase one a success, right?
Don't let your guard down.
Hmph, you worry too much...
Wait, something's not right?
Idiot! Quick...
There's a fire in professor Dietrich's lab! Everyone, come and help fight the fire!
What exactly happened...
Clovis?
W-Where's Morris? What about the lab!?
...*cough*...what are you doing!?
You worthless hack! Why...why are you the one that survived!?
D-Don't tell me...?
Shut up! I'm going to kill you!

I'm sorry. I know you must be feeling devasted.
However, you're not the only one who finds it difficult to accept this reality.
Shut up! You have no right to lecture me!
If you're injured, then you should screw off to the medical room now! You do not deserve to enter professor's lab again!
11 years later
This is everything.
Thank you.
Clovis, have you really not considered staying here and continuing Morris' research? You could take Life Magic to new heights...
I have my own plans.
You mean that mysterious plan of yours which you refuse to let anyone know about? After Morris' passing, you've been totally engrossed in it...
What are you trying to say?
The disaster 11 years ago, you were the first one to arrive at the lab. Did you discover something, or...
I have no intention to talk about this. Besides, you were there on-site. You should know it better than I do, shouldn't you?
After all, that never-aging body of yours...is a direct result of that incident...
All in all, I don't need you to interfere with my business. If that's all you want to say, I'll be taking my leave.
Understood. Via Soul.
